messages.text: Well done Dimitry. Easy one right?
Yes. Prison escape charges and now impersonation..(laughs)
The next mission is one its way.
Listen Viktor, we have to sketch out a plan to rescue Veronica..
We need to wait Dimitry.. Do you think at any cost Veronica will reveal the truth?
Yes. That's the trust. We have to wait. The next move is a burglar attempt at the Donald Emerson's residence.
He's just a member of the Defense team. But reports indicate that he might have a hand in the nuclear program.
Got it. So you want me to break into his home and kick him out untill he reveals the truth?
(laughs) That would be plan B. But there a much simpler option.
You have the identity of US soldier, you can easily get into his house. But somehow look out for his phone and get access to his image gallery. Easy?
Simple. So do you mean the images will also contain the nuclear location's photos?
It wouldn't contain. It's a top secret facility. Surely he wouldn't have captured them.
Then, find the GPS movement history from the phone?
No. Let us just focus on the images and get the nuclear location.
Just get my Aviator. Whats his address?

question:
Objective

Get access to Donald Emerson's phone gallery and obtain the nuclear site location coordinates.

Phone Gallery
